videos.title: 小S悲痛走不出來！Melody「哽咽5秒」揭她近況　忍淚喊話大S家人｜NOWnews
videos.description:
#小S #Melody #哽咽
詳細報導：
https://www.nownews.com/news/6648842
藝人大S（徐熙媛）於今年春節期間驟世日本，享年48歲，其親妹小S（徐熙娣）、S媽（黃春梅）及老公具俊曄等陷入悲痛當中，噩耗震驚各界，而身為小S的好姐妹Melody（殷悅，本名劉恭顯）今（19）日出席精品品牌記者會，被問到有無關心小S？「聽到這個消息很令人難過」，話說一半，難忍情緒哽咽，期間沉默5秒後低聲回應：「人生無常，我們要好好珍惜每天。」Melody提醒眾人把握親愛的親朋好友，並照顧好自己的身體最重要。

videos.title: 曹興誠：馬英九是個混蛋 示警中共把立院變香港立法會｜NOWnews
videos.description:
#曹興誠#馬英九#混蛋#示警#中共#立院#香港立法會
立法院院會今（21）日續審國會改革法案，將挑燈夜戰到深夜12時，議場內藍綠白攻防的同時，場外也集結不滿國會改革的民眾，根據主辦單位指出現場已聚集1.8萬人，聯電創辦人曹興誠也驚喜現身相挺，他致詞時提到，國內法律戰也面臨重大失敗，上週要通過「擴選法案」，想把立法權壓制行政權獨大，「中共正在把台灣立法院變成他的香港立法會」。

詳情報導：https://www.nownews.com/news/6432284

videos.description:

videos.description:

videos.title: 國會調查權激辯 大法官質詢查弊案目的 黃國昌劍指監察院｜NOWnews
videos.description:
#國會#黃國昌#大法官
立法院三讀通過《立法院職權行使法》，總統府、行政院等機關認為國會擴權有違憲疑慮，憲法法庭今（6）日進行言詞辯論，下午是針對國會調查權、藐視國會罪等部分。大法官黃昭元說，不是反對立法院有調查權，但對於國會調查權的程序、範圍，都要有明確規範，不能為調查而調查，換句話說，現在最大的爭議就是，查弊案是不是立法院的職權？

videos.title: 京華城公文「奉交下」不是柯文哲交辦？前秘書長作證全說了｜NOWNEWS #cc字幕
videos.description:
台北地院今天上午傳喚京華城案時任台北市政府秘書長、現任參事陳志銘以證人身分出庭，對於檢方起訴柯文哲的關鍵之一：都發局公文曾寫「奉交下」，就是柯文哲親自交辦本案的證據，陳志銘說那只是承辦人員的個人用語習慣，實際上那份公文只是從秘書處機要組分辦出去、都發局再回函；從公文交辦單的印章是「辛章」可以研判，並未經過市長。

This morning, the Taipei District Court summoned Chen Zhiming, the current commissioner and the then secretary-general of the Taipei City Government, as a witness in the case of the Pavilion of Dreams. Regarding one of the key points in the prosecutor's indictment against Ko Wen-je, which was the mention of "to be forwarded" in the urban development bureau's document as evidence of Ko's direct involvement, Chen stated that it was merely the personal linguistic habit of the personnel in charge. In reality, the document was processed through the secretary’s task force and replied by the urban development bureau. The stamp "Xin Zhang" on the document's order slip indicates that it had not gone through the mayor.（此翻譯來源：ChatGPT）

#台北地院 #京華城 #柯文哲

videos.title: 總統府想派人弔唁柯爸爸　遭柯家人婉拒？民眾黨發言人全說了｜NOWnews
videos.description:
#柯文哲#柯爸爸#民眾黨
民眾黨前主席柯文哲的父親柯承發病逝，享耆壽94歲，今（10）日舉行告別式。而媒體報導指出總統府要派員到場，但被柯家人以「國家大事為重」為由婉拒；民眾黨發言人張彤對此回應，沒有收到相關人員要來弔唁的訊息，而立委張啓楷則強調，尊重柯家人意願。

videos.description:
#愛莉莎莎 #黃國昌 #李進勇
立院內政委員會今（4）日邀請中選會主委李進勇進行業務報告並備詢，民眾黨立委黃國昌問及網紅「愛莉莎莎」等21人質疑做票最後不起訴處分，而中選會卻一句道歉都沒有，且中選會坦承選務有疏失，這些人提出質疑卻被送辦，歷經司法程序與痛苦，而中選會的立場就是「剛好而已」，作為中選會主委連說一聲「歹勢」的格局都沒有。李進勇則回應，對於國家社會法益受到侵害，大家要共同面對，「問題不在我要不要表示歉意」。

videos.description:
網紅呱吉（邱威傑）11日晚間在YouTube進行直播，針對四叉貓（劉宇）最近因為訕笑前台北市長柯文哲喪父事件引發廠商切割潮事件，點評陳沂號召抵制四叉貓合作產品不妥，但同時也表示四叉貓「肉搜行為」不恰當，結果遭到粉絲抖內留言嗆「只是看透了！」讓呱吉突然間爆氣，砸麥克風、耳機，讓大批觀眾瞬間相當驚恐。

Internet celebrity Gua Ji (Qiu Weijie) conducted a live broadcast on YouTube on the evening of the 11th. He commented on the recent incident where Sicha Mao (Liu Yu) mocked the former mayor of Taipei, Ko Wen-je, over his father's passing, leading to a wave of companies cutting ties. Gua Ji criticized Chen Yi's call for a boycott of Sicha Mao's products as inappropriate, but also mentioned that Sicha Mao's "doxxing behavior" was improper. This resulted in a fan leaving a comment through a donation, saying "Just saw through it!", which caused Gua Ji to suddenly burst into anger, smashing his microphone and headphones, shocking a large number of spectators.（此翻譯來源：ChatGPT）

videos.title: 川普夫婦險摔手扶梯！白宮怒喊有人該被解僱 聯合國尷尬回應｜NOWNEWS #cc字幕
videos.description:
美國總統川普（Donald Trump）23日在聯合國大會上發言，談到俄烏戰爭以及移民政策等國際重大議題，不過，川普抵達聯合國時發生小插曲，川普與第一夫人梅蘭妮亞（Melania Trump）踏上手扶梯時，手扶梯突然煞停，川普與梅蘭妮亞表情錯愕，最終只能步行爬上手扶梯。川普隨後在發言時也提到此事，批評聯合國失能；白宮發言人萊威特（Karoline Leavitt）更表示，若是有人故意惡作劇，「他們必須被開除」。然而，聯合國發言人杜雅里克（Stephane Dujarric）指出，手扶梯突然停止是川普團隊的隨行攝影師所造成。

On the 23rd, U.S. President Donald Trump spoke at the United Nations General Assembly, addressing major international issues such as the Russia-Ukraine war and immigration policies. However, upon arriving at the UN, a minor incident occurred. As Trump and First Lady Melania Trump stepped onto the escalator, it abruptly stopped, leaving them startled and eventually forcing them to walk up the escalator. Trump later mentioned the incident during his speech, criticizing the UN for its incompetence. White House spokesperson Karoline Leavitt further stated that if anyone deliberately played a prank, "they must be fired." However, UN spokesman Stephane Dujarric noted that the sudden stop of the escalator was caused by a photographer accompanying Trump's team.（此翻譯來源：ChatGPT）

#川普 #梅蘭妮亞 #美國

videos.title: 不服「超派鐵拳」判太輕！Toyz獄中上訴　超哥臭臉出庭｜NOWNEWS #cc字幕
videos.description:
號稱「全台最有錢YTR」的網紅「超哥」黃伯超，去年（2024）與遊戲實況主Toyz（劉偉健）發生衝突時動怒打人，事後受訪還自稱使用「超派鐵拳」，遭起訴傷害罪，今年4月一審判刑6個月、可易科罰金18萬。Toyz雖是本案被害人，但他因為販毒遭判刑4年2個月正在服刑中，他對於「超派鐵拳」案一審判決不服，請檢方上訴，今日開庭時，委任律師主張超哥動手時曾說「不是你死就是我死」，原審並未考量也判太輕。

Internet celebrity "Chao Ge" Huang Bo-chao, known as the "richest YTR in Taiwan," became angry and hit someone during a conflict last year (2024) with gaming streamer Toyz (Liu Weijian). In an interview afterward, he even claimed to have used "Chao-style Iron Fist." He was prosecuted for assault and sentenced to six months in prison or a fine of 180,000 yuan in an April first trial. Although Toyz is the victim in this case, he is serving a 4-year and 2-month sentence for drug trafficking. He was dissatisfied with the first trial's judgment of the "Chao-style Iron Fist" case and requested the prosecution's appeal. During today's court session, the appointed lawyer claimed that when Chao Ge acted, he said, "It's either you or me," which the original trial did not consider and the sentencing was too lenient.（此翻譯來源：ChatGPT）

#超哥 #Toyz #傷害罪 #起訴 #超派鐵拳

videos.title: 汽車關稅驟降恐爆失業潮？王世堅批經長危言聳聽　質疑裕隆洗產地｜NOWnews
videos.description:
因應美國對等關稅，總統賴清德表示將從台美雙邊零關稅啟動談判，建議將汽車關稅降至零做為談判籌碼，經濟部長郭智輝認為，這恐導致10餘萬人失業。民進黨立委王世堅今（16）日在立法院財政委員會砲轟經長「危言聳聽」，不能把台灣汽車零組件業者當做整車業者裕隆的保護傘，真正「洗產地」就像裕隆引進中國MG汽車，化整為零在台組裝，再用國產車名義銷售。不過，對於立委的質疑，裕隆回應媒體表示，MG車輛僅供國內市場，並未涉及出口，不存在洗產地問題。

videos.description:
#政治 #蔣萬安 #寵物店 #法規 #檢討 
喜愛小動物的47歲黨姓男子砸下400萬在內湖開寵物店，但因與二樓住戶發生糾紛，因無法獲得住戶同意而無法取得營業登記開店，心血付諸東流，26日被發現在店內身亡，引起網友議論。台北市長蔣萬安今（28）日表示，北市住宅區本來無法開設寵物店，是108年修法之後放寬，必須得到左右兩戶與正上方的住戶同意，接下來會請相關局處研究相關規定是否有更妥適的作法。

videos.title: 「堰塞湖是中央管的！」傅崐萁勘災嗆卓榮泰：都是地方政府在救災｜NOWNEWS #cc字幕
videos.description:
花蓮馬太鞍溪堰塞湖23日下午溢流，造成光復鄉市區淹水、橋梁沖斷，多人罹難失聯。行政院長卓榮泰到場勘災，國民黨立院黨團總召傅崐萁當面嗆卓揆，都是地方政府在救災，並逼問卓揆，「堰塞湖在台灣哪個縣市，是地方管還是中央？」卓揆低調回應，「我們今天不談這個事情，事情做好就好」。傅崐萁則說，地方政府救災已經很辛苦了，但民進黨立委吳思瑤與側翼，卻還在造謠，請這些停止攻擊地方政府好嗎？

In the afternoon of the 23rd, a landslide lake in Hualien's Mataian River overflowed, causing flooding in Guangfu Township, bridges to collapse, and multiple people to be reported missing or dead. Premier Zhuo Rongtai inspected the disaster site, where KMT Legislative Caucus leader Fu Kunqi confronted him, claiming that only local governments were providing relief and demanded to know if landslide lakes in Taiwan were managed locally or centrally. Premier Zhuo responded discreetly, saying, "Let's not discuss this today; what's important is that everything gets done." Fu Kunqi commented that local governments are already finding disaster relief challenging, yet DPP Legislator Wu Siyao and other factions are still spreading rumors; he urged them to stop attacking local government efforts.（此翻譯來源：ChatGPT）

#堰塞湖#傅崐萁#卓榮泰

videos.title: 柯文哲7000萬交保！北檢將提抗告　黃國昌轟：檢察官臉被證人打腫｜NOWNEWS #CC字幕
videos.description:
因京華城案遭羈押1年的前民眾黨主席柯文哲昨日7000萬交保，而柯文哲完成交保程序，出了北院後發表談話痛批檢察官毀損台灣社會對司法的信任，並砲轟北檢「查了一年到底查到什麼？什麼都沒查到」，而北檢也於晚間發表聲明駁斥柯文哲的說詞，並表示將會依法提出抗告。對此，民眾黨主席黃國昌今（6）日怒轟北檢善盡責任說法遭證人打臉，臉都被打腫。

Former People's Party Chairman Ko Wen-je, who was detained for a year due to the Jinghuacheng case, was released on bail yesterday for 70 million. After completing the bail procedure and leaving the Northern Court, Ko gave a speech criticizing the prosecutors for damaging Taiwanese society's trust in the judiciary, questioning "What did the Northern Prosecutors find after a year of investigation? Nothing at all." In response, the Northern Prosecutors issued a statement in the evening refuting Ko's remarks and stated that they would file an appeal according to the law. Regarding this, People's Party Chairman Huang Kuo-chang today (6th) lashed out at the Northern Prosecutors, saying their claim of fulfilling responsibilities was contradicted by witnesses, leaving them facing severe criticism.（此翻譯來源：ChatGPT）

videos.description:
#民眾黨 #柯文哲 #政治獻金 #電子腳鐐
民眾黨主席柯文哲涉京華城、政治獻金案日前起訴移審，獲裁定3000萬元交保，檢方提抗告後發回重裁，法官裁定柯加保為7000萬元，加電子腳鐐、限制出境出海。經過妻子陳佩琪、黨團立委多方籌錢，中午過後湊得另外4000萬元保釋金。稍早柯文哲已交保，並戴電子腳鐐現身，全程不發一語面帶燦笑步出北院。外頭小草則不斷對著柯文哲喊，「我們一直都在！不用擔心我們！」

videos.description:
英國、法國、加拿大等多國，近日先後承認巴勒斯坦國，但不只美國、以色列反對，歐洲內部也態度分歧，德國、義大利仍抱持挺以、不承認巴國立場。義大利多地22日爆發「挺巴勒斯坦示威」，但米蘭演變成激烈警民衝突，示威者投擲物品、持棍棒打破中央車站玻璃窗，大批警力出動控制局勢，對示威者發射催淚瓦斯

Recently, multiple countries including the UK, France, and Canada have consecutively recognized the state of Palestine. However, not only the US and Israel oppose this, but there are also divided attitudes within Europe. Germany and Italy still support Israel and do not recognize Palestine. On the 22nd, several pro-Palestinian demonstrations broke out in various parts of Italy, but in Milan, it escalated into intense clashes between the police and protesters. Demonstrators threw objects and used sticks to break the windows of the central station, prompting a large police presence to control the situation and firing tear gas at the protesters.（此翻譯來源：ChatGPT）

videos.description:
檢調近日偵辦罷免綠委死亡連署案，國民黨近期多個地方黨部、幹部分別遭搜索及約談，國民黨立委吳宗憲直指，近期不少檢調單位搜索及扣押資料，竟查扣與案件無關的物件，事後還給民眾還要硬拗「併同帶回」。吳宗憲5日於司法法制委員會質詢法務部長鄭銘謙時，提及有多位義工反映，在搜索現場竟被要求交出手機，手機被看了1個小時再發還，「這些人不是嫌犯，調查局憑什麼臨場檢視人民私人物品？程序正義全被踐踏！」而鄭銘謙面對質詢，一度沉默答不出來。

videos.title: 綠白合作打詐？黃國昌談「打詐4法」：政院有道理部分絕對支持｜NOWnews
videos.description:
#政治 #黃國昌 #打詐 #綠白合 #修法 
行政院長卓榮泰昨日宴請教文與交通委員會綠營立委。會後民進黨立院黨團幹事長吳思瑤轉述表示，大家話題聚焦打詐四法與花東錢坑法案。而吳思瑤也於臉書貼出與民眾黨團副總召黃珊珊討論「打詐四法」的重要配套《洗錢防制法》修法，指出朝野破冰不容易，外界認為綠白將合作打詐。對此，民眾黨團總召黃國昌今（4）日表示，行政院版本有道理部分，民眾黨絕對不吝於支持，但規範不足之處，民眾黨會有自己的立場。

videos.title: 726大罷免／陳昭姿拋「綠白合」3點　黃國昌發聲：不是交換條件｜NOWNEWS
videos.description:
首波大罷免投票24立委＋新竹市長高虹安全數不通過，民眾黨立院黨團幹事長陳昭姿昨晚突在社群平台，拋出「綠白合」3條件，分別是司法公正對待柯文哲、承認國會改革法案以及通過代孕法案。對此，民眾黨主席、立院黨團總召黃國昌今（28）日回應，這次大罷免人民已經發出聲音，對於民進黨政府1年多來撕裂台灣社會、付出巨大成本應該承擔起政治責任，「這不是什麼交換條件」。

The first wave of recall votes against 24 legislators and Hsinchu Mayor Kao Hung-an did not pass. Last night, DPP Legislative Caucus Secretary-General Chen Zhaozi unexpectedly proposed three conditions for a "Green-White Coalition" on social media, which are: fair judicial treatment of Ko Wen-je, acknowledgment of congressional reform bills, and the passage of the surrogacy bill. In response, TPP Chairman and Legislative Caucus Leader Huang Kuo-chang said today (28th) that the people have spoken in this mass recall. The DPP government should take political responsibility for tearing Taiwanese society apart and incurring huge costs over the past year, "this is not a bargaining chip."（此翻譯來源：ChatGPT）

#高虹安#726大罷免#陳昭姿#黃國昌

videos.title: 黃國昌「示範帶」案檢方有動作了！今傳喚民眾黨張啟楷｜NOWNEWS #cc字幕
videos.description:
民眾黨立委黃國昌上個月質詢法務部長時播一段疑似京華城案檢察官偵訊被告朱亞虎的錄音檔，引發譁然，事後他解釋這是「示範帶」，遭民眾告發偽造文書罪，台北地檢署分案後首度有動作，今天下午傳喚民眾黨立院黨團副總召張啟楷

Last month, People's Party legislator Huang Kuo-chang played a recording during his questioning of the Minister of Justice, which appeared to be a prosecutor's interrogation of the defendant Chu Ya-hu in the Jinghua City case, causing a stir. He later explained it was a "demonstration tape," leading to accusations of document forgery by the public. The Taipei District Prosecutors Office has taken its first action after splitting the case, summoning People's Party Legislative Caucus Deputy Convenor Chang Chi-kai this afternoon.（此翻譯來源：ChatGPT）

#京華城案#示範帶#朱亞虎

中國人民解放軍東部戰區今（1）日上午表示，今日開始，解放軍東部戰區組織陸軍、海軍、空軍、火箭軍等兵力，位台灣島周邊聯合演訓，同時強調這是對「台獨」分裂勢力的嚴重警告和有力遏制。這是賴清德總統上月13日宣布中共是敵對勢力後，共軍首度針對台灣進行軍演。國防部表示，自3月29日起，即陸續掌握中共山東號航艦編隊等機艦動態，於昨日進入我應變區。國軍運用聯合情監偵手段，檢派任務機、艦及岸置飛彈系統嚴密監控、掌握，已啟動應變機制，適切應對。

videos.description:
中國首都北京26日起遭遇暴雨襲擊，28日發布暴雨紅色預警，呼籲市民非必要不外出、企業非必要也勿請員工到公司上班。29日最新消息，北京暴雨已導致30人死亡，面對全國大範圍洪災，中國國家主席習近平也做出指示，要各地區和有關部門，除了做好防汛救災工作以外，還要全面壓實政治責任，落實防汛措施。

Starting from the 26th, Beijing, the capital of China, has been hit by heavy rainfall. On the 28th, a red rainstorm warning was issued, urging citizens to avoid going out unless necessary, and advising companies not to require employees to come to work unless essential. The latest news on the 29th reported that the rainstorm in Beijing has led to 30 deaths. In facing the widespread floods across the country, Chinese President Xi Jinping instructed that, in addition to flood prevention and relief efforts, political responsibilities should be fully implemented, and flood prevention measures should be enforced.（此翻譯來源：ChatGPT）

videos.description:
美國總統川普（Donald Trump）4日在白宮舉行私人晚宴，邀請多位科技公司大老共進晚餐。包括微軟創辦人比爾蓋茨（Bill Gates）、蘋果CEO庫克（Tim Cook）、臉書母公司Meta執行長祖克柏（Mark Zuckerberg）等人都列席，期間川普直球對決，一個個問他們打算在美國投資多少錢，頭一個接受「靈魂拷問」的祖克柏看上去明顯有點吃不消。

On the 4th, U.S. President Donald Trump held a private dinner at the White House, inviting several tech company leaders to attend. videos.description:
立法院外交及國防委員會今（16）日邀請官員報告台美關稅談判議題，民眾黨立委黃國昌質詢問到台美關稅談判算是「條約」、「協議」還是「協定」？外交部次長陳明祺稱目前還在談判中，無法確定；黃國昌1秒震怒「起大聲」，要他好好看《條約締結法》第3條，只要內容涉及國防、外交、財政或經濟上利益等國家重要事項，就是條約了！

Today (16th), the Legislative Yuan's Foreign Affairs and National Defense Committee invited officials to report on the Taiwan-US tariff negotiation issues. Legislator Huang Kuo-chang from the People's Party inquired whether the Taiwan-US tariff negotiations can be considered a "treaty," "agreement," or "protocol." Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs Chen Ming-chi stated that since the negotiations are still ongoing, it cannot be determined. Huang Kuo-chang became furious within a second and demanded him to carefully review Article 3 of the Treaty Making Law, asserting that as long as it involves national defense, foreign affairs, fiscal, or economic interests, it is a treaty!（此翻譯來源：ChatGPT）

民眾黨主席柯文哲妻子陳佩琪昨日自爆，柯文哲為佈局2028總統大選要開「小草咖啡廳」，不過因她有公務人員身份，所以先用兒子的名字開公司，「不知道這有違法疑慮，真的很抱歉，已經託人撤銷公司」。不過，此舉卻引發違法疑慮遭檢舉。陳佩琪今（10）日再度臉書發文認錯，但也說公司從7月底才開始有正式帳戶，至今一星期多，都還沒開始有運作，所以她算是有犯意，但未有犯行，請法院從輕量刑。對此，黃國昌表示，陳佩琪已經用很坦然的態度面對，她對外發言都有很有自己的主見，尊重她的意見。

videos.title: 柯媽前往投票被問1問題　黃國昌、高虹安秒擋下｜NOWNEWS#cc字幕
videos.description:
全台大罷免今（26）日正式登場，罷免案包括24位國民黨立委，以及停職中的新竹市長高虹安，投票時間從上午8點起，至下午4點截止。由於民眾黨前主席柯文哲因京華城案羈押當中，民眾黨主席黃國昌今上午陪同柯文哲的媽媽何瑞英前往竹市民富國小投票，柯文哲胞妹柯美蘭以及新竹市長高虹安也一同前往。

The nationwide recall event officially takes place today (26th), involving 24 Kuomintang legislators and the suspended Mayor of Hsinchu City, Ann Kao. Voting begins at 8 AM and ends at 4 PM. Due to the detention of the former chairman of the Taiwan People’s Party, Ko Wen-je, in connection to the Jin Hua Cheng case, the current chairman, Huang Kuo-chang, accompanied Ko Wen-je’s mother, Ho Jui-ying, to the Minfu Elementary School in Hsinchu for voting this morning. Ko Wen-je’s sister, Ko Mei-lan, and the Mayor of Hsinchu City, Ann Kao, also went together.（此翻譯來源：ChatGPT）

videos.title: 陳佩琪吼完法官潰堤　「柯文哲不能出來不如把她一起抓進去」｜NOWNEWS #CC字幕
videos.description:
柯文哲夫人陳佩琪今日前往台北地院旁聽京華城案開庭，先聽到柯文哲請法官就「司法的脆弱」思考是否有必要繼續押他，再聽到審判長江俊彥強調裁定羈押並不擴及有罪與否的認定，但這番解釋仍無法讓陳佩琪接受，在法官退庭時努吼「請問他做了什麼犯罪嫌疑重大？」，之後陳佩琪並未立刻下樓走掉，暫待二樓走廊上時情緒仍難以平復，甚至說出「柯文哲沒辦法出來了，不如把她一起抓進去算了」。

Mrs. Ko Wen-je, Pei-chi Chen, went to the Taipei District Court today to attend the hearing of the Jin Hua Cheng case. At first, she heard Ko Wen-je asking the judge to consider the "fragility of justice" and whether it was necessary to continue detaining him. Then she heard Judge Jiang Junyan emphasize that the decision to detain does not imply any verdict of guilt or innocence. However, this explanation did not satisfy Pei-chi Chen. As the judge was leaving the courtroom, she shouted, "What major suspicion of crime is there against him?" Later, instead of leaving immediately, she stayed upstairs in the hallway, unable to calm down emotionally, and even said, "If Ko Wen-je can't come out, might as well arrest me too."（此翻譯來源：ChatGPT）

#柯文哲 #陳佩琪 #京華城案

videos.title: 「不要把我沒做的事情加在我身上」　家寧不認罪還要傳Andy作證｜NOWNEWS #cc字幕
videos.description:
網紅情侶檔家寧、Andy分手後，對兩人創辦的Youtube頻道「眾量級CROWD」經營權、分紅爆發爭議，檢調依據Andy提告內容偵辦並起訴家寧1家4口，今天首度開庭，家寧雖然躲過逃漏稅與侵占的罪名，但因為Andy堅稱家寧沒經過同意就偷改頻道密碼，檢方以妨害電腦使用罪起訴家寧，她在庭上不認罪，並表示要傳喚Andy作證，在庭外受訪時，對於有人仍誤會她私吞Andy款項相當在意，特別表示她沒做的事情，不要加在她身上。

After breaking up, internet celebrity couple Jianning and Andy had a fallout over the management and revenue distribution of their jointly created YouTube channel "Crowd". The prosecution, based on Andy's allegations, investigated and charged Jianning and three members of her family. The first court hearing took place today. Although Jianning avoided charges of tax evasion and embezzlement, the prosecution indicted her for unauthorized computer use, accusing her of changing the channel password without Andy's consent. Jianning pleaded not guilty and demanded Andy to testify. During an interview outside the court, she expressed her concern over being misunderstood as having embezzled Andy’s funds, emphasizing not to attribute things she didn’t do to her.（此翻譯來源：ChatGPT）

videos.title: 北市買房逾7成收入付房貸　玉山金董座也感嘆：台灣房價真的太高了｜NOWNEWS #cc字幕
videos.description:
玉山金控今（11）日召開法說會，董事長黃男州也談到房市展望。他表示，就成屋來看，房價有些微下跌，畢竟房價已在較高點，若再繼續上升，可能對中產階級影響很大，他也感嘆「台灣房價真的太高了」， 台北市買房家庭有71%的家庭月收入都拿去付房貸，台灣整體平均也達44%，也就是近半收入拿去付房貸，比世界平均值高太多，如何讓房地產正常發展，讓年輕人能用合理價格自住買房，也是政府施政最重要事情之一。

E.SUN Financial Holding held its earnings conference today (11th), where Chairman Huang Nan-Chou also discussed the outlook for the housing market. He noted that, in terms of existing homes, prices have seen a slight decline. However, with housing prices already at high levels, any further increase could significantly impact the middle class. He lamented that “Taiwan’s housing prices are really too high,” pointing out that in Taipei City, 71% of a household’s monthly income goes toward mortgage payments, while the national average is 44% — meaning nearly half of household income is spent on mortgages, far exceeding the global average. He stressed that ensuring the healthy development of the real estate market so young people can purchase homes at reasonable prices is one of the most important priorities for the government.(此翻譯來源:Chatgpt)

#房價#房貸#台灣

videos.title: 陳聖文帶「核廢料水」到國民黨中央踢館　楊智伃一口喝光讚：好喝｜NOWNEWS #cc字幕
videos.description:
重啟核三公投將在23日登場，民進黨台北市黨部前副執行長陳聖文18日聲稱，要帶國民黨送給選民的礦泉水到蘭嶼核廢料貯存場，再帶回台北給國民黨人喝，藍營回嗆，「如果拿回來我們敢喝的話，你們要蟾蜍跳跳回蘭嶼嗎？」陳聖文今（20）日到國民黨中央送水，國民黨發言人楊智伃收下水，並直接在鏡頭前喝下，陳聖文則酸，你想喝不代表民眾想喝。

The referendum on restarting the Third Nuclear Power Plant is set to take place on the 23rd. On the 18th, Chen Shengwen, the former Deputy Executive Director of the Democratic Progressive Party's Taipei City branch, claimed he would take the mineral water given by the Kuomintang to the electorate to the Lanyu nuclear waste storage site and then bring it back to Taipei for the Kuomintang members to drink. The Kuomintang retorted, "If we dare to drink what you bring back, will you make toads jump back to Lanyu?" Today (20th), Chen Shengwen delivered water to the Kuomintang headquarters, where Kuomintang spokesperson Yang Zhiyu accepted it and drank it directly in front of the camera. Chen Shengwen sarcastically remarked, "You may want to drink it, but that doesn't mean the public does."（此翻譯來源：ChatGPT）

#核三#國民黨#民進黨
